name: Rosted chicken Bowl
description: These Hibachi Chicken Bowls feature juicy, sesame soy chicken with fried rice and sautéed veggies...easy and perfect for lunch or dinner!

name: chicken Bowl
description: A southwestern chicken burrito bowl is ideal for those who love Mexican food but want a lighter, healthier option.

name: Chicken Main Dishes
description: Chicken is one of my go-to ingredients when I need a quick and satisfying meal. With its versatility and ability to absorb flavors, it can transform into countless delicious dishes in no time.

name: Chicken Marsala
description: This marsala wine recipe is an Italian-American classic that delivers restaurant-quality flavors with surprisingly straightforward techniques that make it perfect for both weeknight dinners and special occasions.

name: Fajita Chicken burrito bowl
description: The easiest, flavourful Fajita Chicken Burrito Bowl is packed with juicy golden chicken, cilantro lime rice, avocado and a delicious dressing! Perfect for Meal Prep!

name: Sesame Chicken bowl
description: Super saucy, crisp-tender sesame chicken! 1000x better than takeout, made in 30min or less. Serve with rice and broccoli. SO SO GOOD.

name: Vegetarian Rogan Josh
description: Rogan josh is an aromatic lamb curry that is believed to be of Persian origin, although today it is more closely associated with the Kashmir region of India.

name: Vegetarian Mexican Bowl
description: Vegetarian Mexican Bowl with Cilantro Lime Rice, Black Beans, Corn, Avocado, and a Spicy Chipotle Dressing. This bowl is packed with flavor and perfect for a quick and healthy meal.

name: Vegetarian Tabak Maaz
description: Tabak maaz is a traditional dish originating from Kashmir. It's usually made with a combination of lamb ribs, garlic, ginger, cloves, cardamom, turmeric, oil or ghee, and salt. The ribs are boiled with garlic, separated into pieces, and the reserved cooking water is brought to a boil in a pot.
